Name: Police Scanner Radio
About the game: Police Scanner Radio gameplay is free world racing and exploration behind the wheel of a luxury sports car while listening to Police Scanner Radio live audio feeds of real police and fire radio streams! Drive your luxury sports car to find easter eggs and hidden surprises. In future levels will able to find treasures and redeem for Gold Games Points ! Coming soon: Superman mode - faster than a speeding locomotive! The awesome feature of this game is that It has an authentic Police Scanner Radio with real live audio of police, fire, EMS and more. Listen to Police Scanner Radio while driving in a free world exploration game! Save your favorite channels or search for new ones. Or browse the most popular list for guaranteed active channels! Some of the popular feeds include (but are not limited to); Indianapolis Metropolitan Police Tasmania Police - South Chicago Police Department Zone 02 Westmoreland County Public Safety Clearfield County Police, Fire and EMS Dispatch South Bend, Mishawaka and St. Joseph County Police, Fire and EMS Buchanan County Sheriff and EMS, St Joseph Police / Fire FDNY - Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island Cortland County Public Safety Terre Haute Public Safety and Vigo County Fire Davenport and Quad Cities Metro Police, Fire / EMS Lincoln Police and Fire, Lancaster County Sheriff Cleveland Police and Metro Housing Authority Chicago Police Department Zone 01
